zh.Config.index.945945-4: 1、告警级别用于描述告警的严重程度，请根据业务管理方式进行自定义。
zh.Config.index.945945-5: 2、告警级别将会在告警配置中被引用。

en.Config.index.945945-4: 1. The alarm level is used to describe the severity of the alarm, please customize it according to the business management method.
en.Config.index.945945-5: 2. The alarm level will be referenced in the alarm configuration.
en.Config.index.945945-6: 3. Up to 5 levels can be configured.
